titles.title: Amazon pulls AI recap from Fallout TV show after it made several mistakes

summaries.title: Amazon pulls AI recap from Fallout TV show after it made several mistakes

descriptions.text: The errors included getting dialogue wrong and incorrectly claiming a scene was set 100 years earlier than it was.
